question: Analyze the technology adoption trends across different industries and identify the key technologies being focused on.

subtasks.task: Gather data on industry types and their associated technology focus areas from IndustryITTrend table.
Collect technology stack details from CompanyTechStack table to understand which technologies companies are currently using.
Identify financial metrics and industry categorization from CompanyInfo to correlate financial performance with technology adoption.
Analyze vendor partnerships and technology products adopted by companies from CompanyVendorProductDetail table to assess technology sourcing strategies.
Compile social media engagement data from SocialMediaInfo to understand how technology adoption is perceived in the market based on company social media activity.
